channel.title: NPC drops i need help! [317] Delta
channel.description:
ok so i want to drop random amount of coins.. i was using this method
npcdrop = 7 0995 100000 100 npcdrop = 7 0995 300000 50 npcdrop = 7 0995 600000 30
but it sometimes drops 3 piles of coins... how can i make a random drop of coins between a number and another. here is what i thought would work
npcdrop = 2 0995 12+misc.random(200) 35
but it gives me an error... how can i do this^

item.title: NPC drops i need help! [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

hmm for some reason it is not reading the file correctly because it is saying that you put 0+misc.random(200). One sec let me think…all I can say atm is trying

10 +misc.random(200)
sometimes spacing does alot. If I think of what it could be I’ll post it here.

Read full topic
item.source: NPC drops i need help! [317] Delta

item.title: NPC drops i need help! [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

srry um ok so my original thought was just as you said to put the + instead of * but it gives me an error with both now?

this

npcdrop = 2 995 10+misc.random(200) 100

gives me this

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "
0+misc.random(200)"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2040)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:547)
at server.main(server.java:111)

Read full topic
item.source: NPC drops i need help! [317] Delta

item.title: NPC drops i need help! [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

well if you put ummm lets say

10+misc.random(20)
then the drop will take 10 and add a random number between 1-20 so it may do 10+6=16 coins, so this has a drop range of 11-30gp, but if you do

10*misc.random(20)
then the drop will take 10 and multiply a random number between 1-20 so it may do 10*16=160, for this one you have the range of 10-200gp. So depending on how much gp you wish to be dropped will tell you rather to add or multiply.

Read full topic
item.source: NPC drops i need help! [317] Delta

i just needed to know how to work the misc random thing but Thank you!!

item.title: NPC drops i need help! [317] Delta
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

I have a code for something like that but mine is for guards and it’s very similar to what you said gave you an error

npc = 9		995	10*misc.random(1000)	60	//coins

basically npc 9, guard, 995 is coins and it will give coins anywhere from 10-10k at a 60% drop chance.

Read full topic
